product_name: Adventure Medical Kits Tactical Field Trauma Kit
long_description: Designed to be small enough to carry with you on the trail, the Tactical Field Trauma Kit from Adventure Medical Kits includes supplies to treat minor injuries during backcountry adventure.
short_description: Designed to be small enough to carry with you on the trail, the Tactical Field Trauma Kit from Adventure Medical Kits includes supplies to treat minor injuries during backcountry adventure.
